metadata.titleEn: Data set of temporal and spatial distribution of metal element concentrations in snow and ice at Zhongshan Station Dome A Section, Antarctica (1990-2017)
metadata.titleCn: 南极中山站-Dome断面雪冰和冰芯（1990-2017）金属元素浓度数据集
metadata.description: Based on the 33rd Antarctic Scientific Expedition in China, the data set of temporal and spatial distribution of metal element concentrations in snow and ice obtained on the section from Zhongshan Station to Dome A in East Antarctica mainly includes: 1. A shallow ice core obtained 202 km away from Zhongshan Station. The ice core covers the period from 1990 to 2017 with a resolution of years, including metal element iron, hydrogen and oxygen isotopes and other data. 2. Collect a sample every 10km along the Zhongshan Station Dome A section in East Antarctica. The metal elements include rare earth elements, barium and other elements. The data can be used to study the pollution and contribution of natural sources and human activities to Antarctic snow and ice.
metadata.descriptionCn: 基于中国第33次南极科学考察，在东南极中山站至Dome A断面上获取的雪冰金属元素浓度时空分布数据集，主要包括：1、距离中山站202公里处获取的一支浅冰芯，冰芯涵盖时间长度为1990年至2017年，分辨率为年，包括金属元素铁以及氢氧同位素等数据。2、沿着东南极中山站-Dome A断面，每个10公里采集一个样品，金属元素包括稀土元素和钡等元素。数据可用于研究自然源和人类活动对南极雪冰的污染和贡献等。
metadata.instructions: The data includes two Excel tables, which list the concentration of snow and ice elements and the dating results of ice cores.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据包括2个Excel表格，数据表中列出了雪冰元素浓度大小， 以及冰芯定年结果。

background: Iron bioavailability is taken as a limit factor for primary productivity in approximately 40% of the world’s oceans. A significant external iron source to the open ocean is the atmospheric input and particularly the atmospheric deposition of mineral dust from continental regions. Volcanic events, continental shelf and iceberg are also important Fe sources. Therefore, it is still not clear which one is much more important for primary productivity in the Southern Ocean, although the Fe hypothesis has been demonstrated on three High Nutrient Low Chlorophyll (HNLC) regions of the surface ocean where today vanishingly-low dissolved Fe concentrations limit phytoplankton growth. In particular, the magnitude of the bioavailable Fe controls how much the atmospheric CO2 changes during glacial-interglacial cycles, which is very uncertainly. Many dissolved Fe data in seawater from the international GEOTRACES program have been published to elucidate the distributions of Fe in seawater at the global scale. This greatly increases our knowledge of the marine geochemistry of Fe element, however, it is still limited ice core Fe data for paleoclimate study. Recent work also suggests that Fe fertilization likely accounts for 5 to 30 ppmv of the change in the CO2 concentrations observed over glacial-interglacial transitions in Antarctica ice cores. More importantly, with global warming, the ice melting of Greenland ice sheet may release much more bioavailable Fe to the ocean.
research objective: In this study, a shallow ice core (12.5 m) was drilled from the Lambert Glacial Basin, East Antarctica during the 33rd Chinese National Antarctic Research Expedition. DFe and TDFe concentrations were measured and their fluxes were estimated during 1990–2017. The results emphasized that the aeolian mineral dust and volcanic events are thought to be primary Fe sources, and the anthropogenic biomass burning may affect Fe releasing during 1990–2017.
methods: In this study, a shallow ice core (12.5 m, called LGB) was drilled at the Lambert Glacial Basin, East Antarctica. The major ion and metal elements were measured at 5e6 cm resolution in this shallow core, which covered the period 1990e2017.
dataset: The data utilized in this manuscript is found in 4TU.ResearchData.
findings: Our results emphasized that much more dissolved Fe (DFe) from the Cerro Hudson volcanic event (August 1991) was transported to the East Antarctic ice sheet, in comparison with the Pinatubo volcanic event (June 1991). The aeolian dust may be the primary DFe source during 1990–2017. In particular, the DFe variations may be affected by the biomass burning emissions in two periods (1990–1998 and 2014–2017). While total dissolved Fe (TDFe) variations were controlled by the climatic conditions since 2000 because of the temperature (d18O) decreasing at East Antarctica. These Fe data will be useful to assess the modern bioavailable Fe release for the Antarctica ice sheet.
backgroundCn: 铁的生物可利用性被认为是全球约40%海洋初级生产力的限制因素。大气输入，特别是来自大陆地区的矿物尘埃的大气沉降，是开放海洋的重要外部铁源。火山事件、大陆架和冰山也是重要的铁源。因此，目前尚不清楚在南极海域中，哪一种铁源对初级生产力更为重要，尽管铁假说已在三个高营养低叶绿素（HNLC）区域得到验证，这些区域的表层海洋中溶解铁浓度极低，限制了浮游植物的生长。特别是，生物可利用铁的量控制着冰期-间冰期循环中大气CO2的变化，这一点仍然存在很大的不确定性。国际GEOTRACES计划中发布的许多海水溶解铁数据有助于阐明全球范围内海水中铁的分布。这极大地增加了我们对海洋铁元素地球化学的认识，但用于古气候研究的冰芯铁数据仍然有限。最近的研究还表明，铁施肥可能占据了南极冰芯中观察到的CO2浓度在冰期-间冰期过渡期间变化的5到30 ppmv。更重要的是，随着全球变暖，格林兰冰盖的融化可能会向海洋释放更多的生物可利用铁。
research objectiveCn: 在这项研究中，来自东南极拉姆伯特冰川盆地的一个浅冰芯（12.5米）是在第33次中国南极考察期间钻取的。测量了可溶性铁（DFe）和总可溶性铁（TDFe）浓度，并估算了1990年至2017年期间的通量。结果强调，风成矿物尘埃和火山事件被认为是主要的铁源，而人类活动引起的生物质燃烧可能影响1990年至2017年期间的铁释放。
methodsCn: 在这项研究中，在东南极的拉姆伯特冰川盆地钻取了一根浅冰芯（12.5米，称为LGB）。在这根浅冰芯中，主要离子和金属元素的测量分辨率为5厘米，覆盖了1990年至2017年的时期。
datasetCn: 本手稿中使用的数据可以在4TU.ResearchData中找到。
findingsCn: 我们的研究结果强调，与皮纳图博火山事件（1991年6月）相比，1991年8月的塞罗·哈德森火山事件释放的溶解铁（DFe）更多地被输送到东南极冰盖。1990年至2017年期间，风成尘埃可能是主要的DFe来源。特别是，DFe的变化可能受到两个时期（1990-1998年和2014-2017年）生物质燃烧排放的影响。而自2000年以来，总溶解铁（TDFe）的变化则受到气候条件的控制，因为东南极的温度（d18O）在下降。这些铁的数据将有助于评估现代可生物利用铁在南极冰盖的释放。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is there a specific focus on the concentration of iron and rare earth elements in the collected ice core samples?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在收集的冰芯样本中，是否特别关注铁和稀土元素的浓度？

Verification.QuestionEn: Are volcanic events considered in the analysis of metal element sources in the studied ice cores?
Verification.QuestionCn: 火山事件是否在研究冰芯中金属元素来源的分析中考虑？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are metal element concentrations in ice cores typically measured using high-resolution techniques (5-6 cm), annual resolution methods, or other techniques on the East Antarctic ice cores?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 东南极冰芯中的金属元素浓度通常使用高分辨率技术（5-6厘米）、年分辨率方法或其他技术进行测量吗？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the variations in total dissolved iron (TDFe) in East Antarctic ice more influenced by volcanic events, biomass burning, or climatic conditions since 2000?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 自2000年以来，东南极冰层中总溶解铁（TDFe）的变化更受火山事件、生物质燃烧还是气候条件的影响？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the primary sources of iron in the Southern Ocean, and how might they vary over time?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 南极洋中铁的主要来源是什么，它们可能随时间变化吗？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: atmospheric input, volcanic events, continental shelf, icebergs
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 大气输入、火山事件、大陆架、冰山

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where is the shallow ice core drilling site located for collecting metal element data in East Antarctica?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在东南极收集金属元素数据的浅冰芯钻探地点位于哪里？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: When was the data collection period covered by the shallow ice core from East Antarctica?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 东南极的浅冰芯数据收集时间段是什么时候？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how a dataset can be utilized to understand the sources of dissolved iron to the East Antarctic ice sheet?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个示例，说明如何利用数据集来了解东南极冰盖中溶解铁的来源？
Example.AnswerEn: The dataset includes DFe and TDFe concentrations and their fluxes estimated from the Lambert Glacial Basin ice core, emphasizing the contribution of aeolian mineral dust and volcanic events as primary Fe sources during 1990–2017.
Example.AnswerCn: 该数据集包括来自兰伯特冰川盆地冰芯的DFe和TDFe浓度及其通量，强调了在1990年至2017年期间，风成矿物尘埃和火山事件作为主要铁源的贡献。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the snow ice and ice core metal element concentration data collected from the Zhongshan Station-Dome A transect in Antarctica?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 从南极中山站-穹顶A横断面收集的雪冰和冰芯金属元素浓度数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: spatial and temporal distribution, 1990 to 2017, shallow ice core, 202 kilometers from Zhongshan Station, annual resolution, metal elements like iron, hydrogen-oxygen isotopes, samples every 10 kilometers, rare earth elements, barium
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 1990年至2017年，距中山站202公里的浅层冰芯的空间和时间分布，年分辨率，金属元素如铁，氢氧同位素，每10公里采样，稀土元素，钡。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What specific features are measured in the ice core that was drilled from the Lambert Glacial Basin, East Antarctica?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在东南极的拉姆伯特冰川盆地钻取的冰芯中测量了哪些具体特征？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 12.5 meters deep, major ion and metal elements, resolution of 5 to 6 cm, period from 1990 to 2017, dissolved iron (DFe) concentrations, total dissolved iron (TDFe) concentrations, flux estimates
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 12.5米深，主要离子和金属元素，分辨率为5到6厘米，时间段从1990年到2017年，溶解铁（DFe）浓度，总溶解铁（TDFe）浓度，通量估算。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many samples were collected along the East Antarctic Zhongshan Station-Dome A section for the metal element concentration dataset?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在东南极中山站-阿尔卑斯山段收集了多少个样本用于金属元素浓度数据集？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What was the length of the ice core drilled for the metal element concentration data collected during the Chinese National Antarctic Research Expedition?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 中国国家南极研究 expedition 钻取的冰芯长度是多少，以收集金属元素浓度数据？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over how many years does the ice core data for metal elements cover, and what is its temporal resolution?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 冰芯数据覆盖了多少年的金属元素数据，时间分辨率是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'spatial distribution data' in the context of snow ice metal element concentration studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在雪冰金属元素浓度研究中，“空间分布数据”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of snow ice metal element concentration studies, 'spatial distribution data' refers to the collection of data samples at various locations, such as every 10 kilometers along a transect, to understand how metal elements like rare earth elements and barium are distributed across a specific region, such as the East Antarctic Zhongshan Station to Dome A transect.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在雪冰金属元素浓度研究的背景下，“空间分布数据”是指在不同地点收集的数据样本，例如沿着一个横断面每10公里采样一次，以了解稀土元素和钡等金属元素在特定区域（如东南极的中山站到阿尔法穹顶的横断面）中的分布情况。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the metal element measurement resolution in ice cores compare to the sampling interval along the East Antarctica transect in terms of capturing temporal variations?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 冰芯中金属元素测量的分辨率与东南极横断面上的采样间隔相比，在捕捉时间变化方面如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The metal elements in the ice cores were measured at a resolution of 5-6 cm, covering the period from 1990 to 2017, which provides high-resolution temporal data. In contrast, samples along the East Antarctica transect were collected every 10 kilometers, which gives spatial distribution data but may not capture fine temporal variations as effectively as the ice core measurements.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 冰芯中的金属元素以5-6厘米的分辨率进行测量，覆盖了1990年至2017年的时期，这提供了高分辨率的时间数据。相比之下，东南极横断面上的样本每10公里收集一次，这提供了空间分布数据，但可能无法像冰芯测量那样有效捕捉细微的时间变化。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the similarities and differences between the sources of iron considered in the ice core analysis compared to those in the open ocean studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 冰芯分析中考虑的铁源与开放海洋研究中的铁源之间的相似性和差异是什么？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both the ice core analysis and open ocean studies consider aeolian mineral dust and volcanic events as primary sources of iron. However, the ice core analysis specifically highlights the impact of anthropogenic biomass burning on iron release, which is not a primary focus in open ocean studies where continental shelves and icebergs are also considered significant sources of iron.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 冰芯分析和开放海洋研究都将风成矿物尘埃和火山事件视为铁的主要来源。然而，冰芯分析特别强调了人类生物质燃烧对铁释放的影响，而在开放海洋研究中，陆架和冰山也被认为是铁的重要来源。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of measuring dissolved iron in ice cores differ from those encountered in seawater, particularly in terms of paleoclimate studies?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在古气候研究中，测量冰芯中溶解铁的挑战与测量海水中的溶解铁有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Measuring dissolved iron in ice cores for paleoclimate studies is limited by the historical data available, which can be sparse compared to the more comprehensive datasets from programs like GEOTRACES for seawater. Additionally, ice core studies face the challenge of isolating anthropogenic influences like biomass burning, which do not significantly affect seawater iron measurements. The focus in ice cores is more on historical climatic conditions, while seawater studies aim to elucidate current global distributions of iron.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在冰芯中测量溶解铁以进行古气候研究受到历史数据的限制，这些数据相比于像GEOTRACES这样的海水项目的数据更为稀疏。此外，冰芯研究面临着隔离人类影响（如生物质燃烧）的挑战，这些影响对海水铁测量的影响并不显著。冰芯研究更侧重于历史气候条件，而海水研究则旨在阐明当前全球铁的分布。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn about the impact of climatic conditions on total dissolved Fe variations from the observed data between 2000 and 2017 in East Antarctica?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 从2000年至2017年东南极观测数据中可以得出关于气候条件对总溶解铁变化影响的哪些见解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The climatic conditions, particularly the decrease in temperature (as indicated by d18O data), appear to control the variations in total dissolved Fe since 2000. This suggests that climatic shifts can alter the geochemical processes affecting iron concentrations in ice cores, highlighting the sensitivity of Fe deposition to environmental changes.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 气候条件，特别是温度的下降（如d18O数据所示），似乎控制了自2000年以来总溶解铁的变化。这表明气候变化可以改变影响冰芯中铁浓度的地球化学过程，突显了铁沉积对环境变化的敏感性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways could the data on biomass burning emissions from 1990–1998 and 2014–2017 contribute to understanding human impact on Fe release in Antarctica?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 1990-1998年和2014-2017年的生物质燃烧排放数据可以通过哪些方式帮助理解人类对南极铁释放的影响？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The data indicating that biomass burning emissions may have affected dissolved Fe variations during these periods suggest a link between human activities and Fe release in Antarctica. This highlights the potential influence of anthropogenic factors on the biogeochemical cycles in polar environments, offering insights into how human-induced emissions can alter natural processes in remote regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据显示，生物质燃烧排放可能在这些时期影响了溶解铁的变化，这表明人类活动与南极地区铁的释放之间存在联系。这突显了人为因素对极地环境生物地球化学循环的潜在影响，提供了关于人类引发的排放如何改变偏远地区自然过程的见解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the selection of sampling locations along the snow and ice transect from Zhongshan Station to Dome A for collecting metal element concentration data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在从中山站到穹顶A的雪和冰横断面上选择采样地点时，哪些因素会影响金属元素浓度数据的采集？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Sampling locations along the snow and ice transect from Zhongshan Station to Dome A are selected based on the need to capture spatial distribution of metal elements, with samples collected every 10 kilometers to provide comprehensive coverage. This method ensures a detailed understanding of the metal elements, including rare earth elements and barium, in this region.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在从中山站到穹顶A的雪和冰横断面上，采样地点的选择是基于捕捉金属元素空间分布的需要，每10公里采集一次样本，以提供全面的覆盖。这种方法确保了对该地区金属元素，包括稀土元素和钡的详细了解。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might the concentration of dissolved iron in East Antarctic ice cores vary due to different environmental events over time?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么东南极冰芯中溶解铁的浓度会因不同的环境事件而随时间变化？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The concentration of dissolved iron in East Antarctic ice cores can vary due to environmental events such as aeolian mineral dust deposition and volcanic events. For instance, the Cerro Hudson volcanic event in August 1991 contributed significantly to increased dissolved iron levels in comparison to other events like the Pinatubo volcanic eruption in June 1991. Additionally, biomass burning emissions during specific periods (1990-1998 and 2014-2017) may influence the variations in dissolved iron levels.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 东南极冰芯中溶解铁的浓度可能因环境事件而有所变化，例如风成矿物尘埃沉积和火山事件。例如，1991年8月的塞罗·休德火山事件显著增加了溶解铁水平，相较于1991年6月的皮纳图博火山喷发。此外，特定时期（1990-1998年和2014-2017年）生物质燃烧排放也可能影响溶解铁水平的变化。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes might lead to the observed changes in total dissolved iron variations in East Antarctica since 2000?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 自2000年以来，东南极地区总溶解铁变化的观察原因可能是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Changes in total dissolved iron variations in East Antarctica since 2000 are primarily caused by climatic conditions, particularly the decrease in temperature as indicated by d18O measurements. This climatic change impacts the deposition and concentration of dissolved iron in the region's ice cores.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 自2000年以来，东南极总溶解铁变化的主要原因是气候条件的变化，特别是通过d18O测量所指示的温度下降。这种气候变化影响了该地区冰芯中溶解铁的沉积和浓度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of using ice core data from the Lambert Glacial Basin to infer the sources of iron deposition in the East Antarctic region?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用拉姆伯特冰川盆地的冰芯数据来推断东南极地区铁沉积的来源可能带来的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using ice core data from the Lambert Glacial Basin can help identify primary iron sources such as aeolian mineral dust and volcanic events, and assess the impact of anthropogenic biomass burning on iron release during 1990–2017.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用来自拉姆伯特冰川盆地的冰芯数据可以帮助识别主要的铁源，如风成矿物尘埃和火山事件，并评估1990年至2017年间人类生物质燃烧对铁释放的影响。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What might be the outcomes of measuring metal elements at a high resolution in shallow ice cores for understanding past climate conditions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在浅层冰芯中以高分辨率测量金属元素可能对理解过去气候条件产生的结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: High-resolution measurements of metal elements in shallow ice cores can reveal variations in dissolved iron that are influenced by volcanic events, aeolian dust, and climatic conditions, providing insights into past climate conditions and bioavailable iron release.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 浅冰芯中金属元素的高分辨率测量可以揭示溶解铁的变化，这些变化受到火山事件、风成尘埃和气候条件的影响，从而提供对过去气候条件和生物可利用铁释放的洞察。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects of integrating aeolian dust data from East Antarctica on the understanding of bioavailable iron's role in climate change?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 整合来自东南极的风成尘埃数据对理解生物可利用铁在气候变化中的作用可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Integrating aeolian dust data can highlight its role as a primary source of dissolved iron, affecting bioavailability and influencing climate change through variations in atmospheric CO2 during glacial-interglacial transitions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 整合风成尘埃数据可以突出其作为溶解铁主要来源的作用，影响生物可利用性，并通过在冰川-间冰期过渡期间大气二氧化碳的变化影响气候变化。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended research objectives behind collecting metal element concentration data from snow and ice cores along the Zhongshan Station-Dome A transect in East Antarctica?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集来自东南极中山站-穹顶A横断面的雪和冰芯中金属元素浓度数据的研究目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The research objectives include understanding the spatiotemporal distribution of metal elements, such as iron, and isotopes from 1990 to 2017, to study natural sources and human activities' contributions to Antarctic snow and ice pollution.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 研究目标包括了解1990年至2017年间金属元素（如铁）和同位素的时空分布，以研究自然来源和人类活动对南极雪和冰污染的贡献。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the goal of measuring and analyzing total dissolved iron and other elements in shallow ice cores from East Antarctica?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 测量和分析东南极浅冰芯中总溶解铁和其他元素的目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to estimate the fluxes of dissolved iron and understand their primary sources, like aeolian mineral dust and volcanic events, as well as the impact of anthropogenic activities such as biomass burning on Fe release.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是估算溶解铁的通量，并了解其主要来源，如风成矿物尘埃和火山事件，以及人类活动如生物质燃烧对铁释放的影响。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can researchers differentiate between natural and anthropogenic sources of metal elements in Antarctic ice cores when analyzing the data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 研究人员如何在分析南极冰芯数据时区分金属元素的自然来源和人类来源？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The research emphasizes differentiating sources by analyzing variations in dissolved Fe (DFe) from events like volcanic eruptions, aeolian dust, and anthropogenic biomass burning, using historical and climatic context to identify potential periods and sources.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 研究强调通过分析溶解铁（DFe）的变化来区分不同来源，例如火山喷发、风成尘和人类生物质燃烧，利用历史和气候背景来识别潜在的时期和来源。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary for collecting high-resolution metal element data from ice cores in Antarctic regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在南极地区收集高分辨率金属元素数据的条件有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection of high-resolution metal element data from ice cores in Antarctic regions requires drilling shallow ice cores, such as a 12.5 m ice core, and measuring major ion and metal elements at a precise resolution of 5-6 cm, covering specific time periods like 1990-2017.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 从南极地区的冰芯中收集高分辨率金属元素数据需要钻取浅层冰芯，例如12.5米的冰芯，并在5-6厘米的精确分辨率下测量主要离子和金属元素，覆盖特定的时间段，如1990-2017年。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the spatial sampling strategy along a transect from Zhongshan Station to Dome A enable comprehensive analysis of snow and ice metal element distribution?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 沿着从中山站到穹顶A的横断面进行的空间采样策略如何使雪和冰中金属元素分布的综合分析成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: A spatial sampling strategy that involves collecting samples every 10 kilometers along the Zhongshan Station to Dome A transect enables comprehensive analysis by providing data on the spatial distribution of metal elements, including rare earth elements and barium, which can be used to study the effects of natural sources and human activities on Antarctic snow and ice pollution.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 一种空间采样策略是在中山站到穹顶A的横断面上每10公里收集样本，这使得通过提供金属元素（包括稀土元素和钡）的空间分布数据进行全面分析成为可能，这些数据可用于研究自然源和人类活动对南极雪和冰污染的影响。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how could future datasets be expanded or refined to enhance our understanding of the contribution of natural sources versus anthropogenic activities to Antarctic snow and ice pollution?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，未来的数据集可以如何扩展或优化，以增强我们对自然来源与人为活动对南极雪和冰污染贡献的理解？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Future datasets could be expanded by incorporating longer ice core records, including additional sampling sites to capture regional variability, and integrating other environmental proxies such as isotopic compositions. Refinements could also include improved analytical methods to differentiate between natural and anthropogenic sources of pollutants more accurately. Enhanced datasets would better support the assessment of the relative contributions of natural events and human activities to Antarctic snow and ice pollution.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 未来的数据集可以通过纳入更长的冰芯记录、增加采样地点以捕捉区域变异性，以及整合其他环境代理（如同位素组成）来扩展。改进还可以包括提高分析方法，以更准确地区分污染物的自然来源和人为来源。增强的数据集将更好地支持评估自然事件和人类活动对南极雪和冰污染的相对贡献。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the metal elements are accurately measured in the snow and ice samples collected from East Antarctica.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何准确测量从东南极收集的雪和冰样本中的金属元素。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The major ion and metal elements were measured at 5 to 6 cm resolution in a shallow ice core that covered the period from 1990 to 2017.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在一根浅冰芯中，以5到6厘米的分辨率测量了主要离子和金属元素，覆盖了1990年至2017年的时期。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the role of anthropogenic activities in influencing metal concentrations in the Antarctic ice cores.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对人类活动在影响南极冰芯中金属浓度方面的作用感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The research suggests that anthropogenic biomass burning may affect the release of iron during the period from 1990 to 2017, influencing metal concentrations in the ice cores.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 研究表明，人为生物质燃烧可能在1990年至2017年期间影响铁的释放，从而影响冰芯中的金属浓度。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how the spatial distribution of metal elements in snow and ice from the Zhongshan-Dome A transect is determined.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解来自中山-阿尔卑斯山横断面雪和冰中金属元素的空间分布是如何确定的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Samples were collected every 10 kilometers along the Zhongshan-Dome A transect, which included measurements of metal elements such as rare earth elements and barium, to determine their spatial distribution.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 样本沿着中山-穹顶A横断面每10公里收集一次，包括稀土元素和钡等金属元素的测量，以确定它们的空间分布。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the methods used for measuring metal elements in ice cores and discuss their resolution and time coverage.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析用于测量冰芯中金属元素的方法，并讨论它们的分辨率和时间覆盖范围。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methods used for measuring metal elements in ice cores involved drilling a shallow ice core (12.5 m) at the Lambert Glacial Basin, East Antarctica. Major ions and metal elements were measured at a resolution of 5 to 6 cm, and the time coverage was from 1990 to 2017.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在东南极的兰伯特冰川盆地，采用钻取浅层冰芯（12.5米）的方法测量金属元素。主要离子和金属元素的测量分辨率为5到6厘米，时间覆盖范围为1990年至2017年。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the potential for expanding datasets by incorporating additional samples along the East Antarctic transect, focusing on rare earth elements and barium.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查通过在东南极横断面上增加额外样本来扩展数据集的潜力，重点关注稀土元素和钡。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The dataset mentioned includes samples collected every 10 kilometers along the East Antarctic transect from Zhongshan Station to Dome A, focusing on metal elements including rare earth elements and barium. This approach could potentially be expanded by collecting more samples along the transect to enhance the dataset's comprehensiveness.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 该数据集包括沿东南极从中山站到穹顶A每10公里收集的样本，重点关注金属元素，包括稀土元素和钡。这种方法可以通过沿该横断面收集更多样本来扩展，以增强数据集的全面性。
